system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: The user may freely move up to the Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack. On hit, the user steals the positive stage effects the target before applying damage from this attack, and the target's default stages are lowered by -1.
Requirement: [Marshadow] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Spectral Thief on the user's Active List.
